sourcesContent:
import { useParams } from "react-router-dom"; import { hostels } from "../Components/Hostel/hostelMock"; export default function HostelDetails() { const { id } = useParams(); const hostel = hostels.find((h) => h.id === Number(id)); if (!hostel) { return (

Hostel Not Found

); } const avgRating = hostel.reviews?.length > 0 ? ( hostel.reviews.reduce((sum, r) => sum + r.rating, 0) / hostel.reviews.length ).toFixed(1) : "N/A"; // const userHasReviewed = this.state.currentUser && hostel.reviews.some(r => r.userId === this.state.currentUser.id); return (

${hostel.name}

${hostel.area}, Islamabad

PKR ${hostel.rent.toLocaleString()} / month

${avgRating} (${hostel.reviews.length} reviews)

Description

${hostel.description}

Amenities

${hostel.amenities.map(amenity => `
${amenity}
`).join('')}

Hostel Information

Gender: ${hostel.gender}

Profession: ${hostel.profession}

${!this.state.currentUser ? `

Please log in to review or ask questions.

` : ''}
{/* ${this.state.currentUser?.role === 'user' && !userHasReviewed ? `

Write a Review

${[1,2,3,4,5].map(star => ``).join('')}
` : ''} ${userHasReviewed ? `

You have already reviewed this hostel.

`: ''} */}
${hostel.reviews.length > 0 ? hostel.reviews.map(review => { const user = this.state.users.find(u => u.id === review.userId); return `
${[...Array(5)].map((_, i) => ``).join('')}

${user ? user.name : 'Anonymous'}

${this.state.currentUser?.role === 'admin' ? `` : ''}

${review.text}

` }).join('') : '

No reviews yet. Be the first to write one!

'}
${this.state.currentUser?.role === 'user' ? `

Ask a Question

` : ''}
${hostel.questions.length > 0 ? hostel.questions.map(q => { const user = this.state.users.find(u => u.id === q.userId); return `

Q: ${q.text}

Asked by ${user ? user.name : 'Anonymous'}

${q.answer ? `

A: ${q.answer}

Answered by Hostel Owner

`: `

Awaiting answer from owner...

`}
` }).join('') : '

No questions have been asked yet.

'}
); }
